thread.title: Nick Knowles' wife Jessica lifts the lid on their doomed marriage: 'He acted more like my dad... goodbye Mr Wrinkly'
thread.title_full: Nick Knowles' wife Jessica lifts the lid on their doomed marriage: 'He acted more like my dad... goodbye Mr Wrinkly'

author: mirror
title: Nick Knowles' wife Jessica lifts the lid on their doomed marriage: 'He acted more like my dad... goodbye Mr Wrinkly'
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
They've had a testing romance from the beginning, but now it seems that Nick Knowles is finally free to play the field - after claims his wife has left their marital home to find a younger man. 
According to reports published on Sunday, Jessica Knowles has moved from the property she shared with the DIY SOS presenter after 'finding evidence' of other women. 
It's alleged the 29 year-old has finally packed her bags and made a clean break from the star, who's rapidly becoming more famous for his personal life than his presenting skills. Speaking to The Daily Star , a source said Jess told them: "Some days he acted more like my dad than my husband. It's goodbye Mr Wrinkly and hello tight, firm abs. Nick Knowles has suffered a very up-and-down relationship (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Jessica has reportedly quit the marriage (Photo: Ian Vogler) Read More 
"I am looking for someone closer to my age. Tall dark and handsome only need apply and hot bodies – Nick wasn't in the best shape." 
The Mirror have contacted a representative for Mr Knowles, but are yet to receive a response. 
The claims come just weeks after Jessica talked to the Sunday People and ­confessed she still had feelings for Nick, 54, the dad of their two-year-old son Eddie. 
Jess, who has battled cervical cancer , also told how she is not currently looking for love. She said: “I literally haven’t thought about dating. I’m happy to just be in a stable, calm place. 
"I can’t imagine what it’d be like if we were at each other’s throats. He’s very attractive and I care about him lots.” Nick Knowles and Jessica Morris pictured in happier times (Photo: PA) The housewives' favourite is free and single again (Photo: Manchester Evening News) Read More 'We tried so hard' - Jessica Knowles admits her marriage to BBC star Nick Knowles is OVER, despite recent reunion 
In September, housewives’ favourite Nick, who has hosted the hit BBC DIY show since 1999, was spotted cuddling former Emmerdale star Gemma Oaten, 32, at the TV Choice magazine awards. 
It later emerged Nick had taken her on a romantic weekend to Edinburgh. A month later Gemma claimed Nick had dumped her “like a ton of bricks” when pictures of them together emerged. 
He issued a statement about the fling, calling it: “Something that happened (in the space of less than one week) during a turbulent, traumatic time and more to the point – whilst we were separated.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
